item.description:
Due to inclement weather, our Atheist Holiday Caroling has been rescheduled. We will now be using the original time for a low-key rehearsal and the consuming of holiday beverages and snacks!

We will be meeting at my apartment in Porter Square at 6pm. I have a keyboard but not the skills to play it well, so please let me know if you have piano or accompaniment experience and might be able to play parts a bit.

To get to my apartment, walk north from the Porter T stop (towards CVS), continue past Shaw's, and go down the street that dead-ends into Shaw's. We are about the sixth house on the right. 617-407-8782 if you need assistance. We will likely be under two hours, so if you are driving, you may want to park in the Shaw's lot -- at your own risk!

Re: RSVP: we have limited space available -- 15 tops -- so be diligent about following through. Also, if you will be unable to attend on Saturday, please at least RSVP as a "maybe" to give other folks the first shot at coming. We'll gladly welcome extra company... if there's room!
item.name: Atheist Holiday Caroling Rehearsal
